column3: Sanity tested OK; would be nice if it checked the memory pool for 0-confirmation "other people's" transactions.\n
Much more complete and totally reworked version pushed.\n
Needs rebasing. Sipa broke everything using locks. >_<\n
This needs rebasing (merges clean, but won't build)\n
Doesn't this ReadFromDisk() fail for memory pool transactions?  I could've sworn memory pool txns weren't written to disk until they were included in a block...\n
